description: The Greek myDATA v1.0.9 provided by AADE is in a single dll. Get full control and support from myDATA. It offers a number of simple tools that make creating apps that support myDATA simple and quick.
releaseNotes:
The rapid expansion of the DLL library's capabilities, combined with additional features not exclusively related to myDATA, has resulted in a reorganization of the classes.
Following the structured programming model, and for better tracking and organization of your code, we have organized the classes into namespaces.
Specifically:
1. We have renamed the main namespace from "arbitrans_myDATA_framework" to "ArbitransMyData", which now only includes the Activation class for activating and managing your subscription to the myDATA DLL library.
2. We have created the namespace MyDataApi, which contains all of the necessary myDATA classes.
3. We have created the namespace MyDataUtilities, which contains essential tools will make the process of integrating myDATA into your software simpler.
4. We have created the namespace POS, which contains all the necessary classes to integrate your software with POS terminals.
5. We've created the namespace Providers, which contains all the necessary classes to connect your software with third-party providers.
6. Your code will undergo minimal changes, resulting in a significantly smaller codebase. Specifically, you only need to make the following changes:

A. Replace the following
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.CancelInvoices
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.RequestInvoices
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.RequestInvoicesProvider
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.RequestMyExpenses
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.RequestMyIncome
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.RequestReceiverInfoProvider
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.RequestVatInfo
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.SendClassifications
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.SendInvoices
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.SendPaymentsMethod
with
    ArbitransMyData.MyDataApi

B. Replace the following
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.ExchangeRates
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.VatSearchTaxis
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.VatSearchVIES
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.myDATATools
with
    ArbitransMyData.MyDataUtilities

C. Replace the following
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.VivaWalletPOS
with
    ArbitransMyData.POS

D. Replace the following
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.ProvIlyda
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.ProvOrian
    arbitrans_myDATA_framework.ProvPrimer
with
    ArbitransMyData.Providers

 Class provOrian
1. The method resendB2G has been added.  With this method, you can resend the B2G invoice, in case of softReject, making only the changes required, without having to cancel and reissue the document.

Documentation
We have updated the documentation to reflect the new changes.
